name: Disney's Hide & Sneak
description: Disney's Hide and Sneak, known in Japan as Mickey and Minnie Trick and Chase (ミッキー＆ミニー トリック＆チェイス, Mikkī & Minī Torikku & Cheisu), is an action-adventure video game released in 2003 by Capcom. This is the last game to feature Mickey Mouse as protagonist until the 2010 video game Epic Mickey.
